name: Host Driver
description: The Core driver, which is a generic NWP driver for the CC31xx/CC32xx SimpleLink products. The other is platform abstraction layer, which provides a means to communicate with the host platform hardware and operating system services.

name: ROM Services
description: The CC32xx ROM hosts the bootloader and peripheral driver library. The peripheral driver library is a collection of routines that abstracts the peripheral programming.

name: Examples
description: TI's SimpleLink CC32xx SDK provides a comprehensive set of examples to help developers get started with the SimpleLink CC32xx MCU. The SimpleLink CC32xx SDK provides examples that cover how to use TI-Drivers, TI-RTOS, and networking demo applications.

name: Documents
description: The SimpleLink CC32xx SDK comes with documentation for all of the supported software libraries included in the SDK. For a good overview of what documentation is available in the SimpleLink CC32xx SDK, go to "Documentation Overview". To get started quickly with the SimpleLink CC32xx SDK, go to "Quick Start Guide".
